A

AddFromCamera - class jpo.AddFromCamera.
This class creates a JFrame and then presents the user with the dialog to add pictures directly from the camera.
AddFromCamera(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.AddFromCamera
Creates a JFrame with the GUI elements and buttons that can start and stop the reconciliation.
AdvanceTimer - class jpo.AdvanceTimer.
This class implements a Thread waits a period of time and then calls the method requestAdvance on it's calling object.
AdvanceTimer(AdvanceTimerInterface, int) - Constructor for class jpo.AdvanceTimer
Constructor which should be called with the object to wake up and the delay this is to be done after.
AdvanceTimerInterface - interface jpo.AdvanceTimerInterface.
This interface defines what methods the implementing object must have if it wants be the receiver of AdvanceTimer events.
ApplicationJMenuBar - class jpo.ApplicationJMenuBar.
This class builds the main menu of the Jpo application.
ApplicationJMenuBar(ApplicationMenuInterface) - Constructor for class jpo.ApplicationJMenuBar
Creates a menu object for use in the main frame of the application.
ApplicationMenuInterface - interface jpo.ApplicationMenuInterface.
This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create an ApplicationJMenuBar.
abortFlag - Variable in class jpo.SourcePicture
Indicator to tell us if the loading was aborted.
accept(File) - Method in class jpo.ImageFilter
accepts directories and files ending in .jpg, .jpeg, .tif, .tiff or .gif
accept(File) - Method in class jpo.JarFilter
accepts directories and files ending in .jar
accept(File) - Method in class jpo.JpgFilter
accepts directories and files ending in .jpg, .jpeg, .tif, .tiff or .gif
accept(File) - Method in class jpo.XmlFilter
accepts directories and files ending in .xml

adjustVisibility(Rectangle) - Method in class jpo.NonFocussedCaret

advanceTimer - Variable in class jpo.PictureViewer

advanceTimerPollingInterval - Static variable in class jpo.Settings
